thread.section_title: Travel: late deals & bargains, holiday news and advice - Mirror Online
thread.title: Holiday deals of the week with last minute bargain sunshine, city breaks and hotels
thread.title_full: Holiday deals of the week with last minute bargain sunshine, city breaks and hotels - Mirror Online

author: Stacey Quinton
title: Holiday deals of the week with last minute bargain sunshine, city breaks and hotels
text:
UNDER £100
Travelodge from £8.75pp:
For October half-term Travelodge has released over 70,000 rooms from just £35. Explore one of 66 great UK cities staying in a family room for two adults and two kids.
Rovers Return from £80pp:
Enjoy A Night at the Rovers in Madame Tussauds Blackpool, an out of hours event which includes a complimentary drink, a hotpot dinner and a night at the three-star Inn on the Prom at the Fernlea on October 10. Call 0800 042 0288.
Travel editor's pick of the week
Prague from £96pp:
This two-night B&B break at the four-star Hotel Galileo includes flights from Stansted on October 18. Call 0800 111 6271.
UNDER £250
Dubrovnik from £179pp:
This three-night B&B stay at the five-star Hotel Croatia Cavtat includes return flights from Gatwick departing November 4. Call 0800 083 6000.
Reykjavik from £179pp:
Stay two nights room only at the three-star Arctic Comfort Hotel for this great price flying from Manchester on October 6. Call 020 3499 5232.
Cheshire from £237pp:
Enjoy three nights half board at Alvaston Hall Hotel from October 2, save £174pp and see a Whitney Houston tribute act. Call 0330 100 9774.
UNDER £500
Menorca from £395pp:
This seven-night half-board break at the adult-only Barceló Hamilton Menorca in Mahon includes Gatwick flights leaving October 19. Call 0203 451 2688.
Boston from £429pp:
Book by September 22 to enjoy three nights at the four-star Royal Sonesta Hotel Boston including return flights from Heathrow travelling November 1 to December 15.
UNDER £900
Mexico from £749pp: This seven-night all-inclusive break at the four-star-plus Occidental Grand Xcaret, includes transfers and return flights from Gatwick on September 24. Call 01293 735 831.
Malaysia from £899pp:
Get £260pp off seven nights room only at the four-star Holiday Villa Beach Resort Langkawi. Book by September 30 to fly from Heathrow November 1 – December 14. Call 01342 886941.
